from django.core import serializers

from ecommerce.inventory.models import (

Category, Product, ProductAttribute, ProductAttributeValue, ProductInventory, ProductType, ProductTypeAttributeValues, Stock,

)

# All Products Product.objects.all()

# Get individual Item Product.objects.get(name=”Django Book 1”)

# Get all inventory items for an individual product qs = ProductInventory.objects.filter(product__web_id=”1234”)

# Get current stock levels Stock.objects.get(product_inventory_id__sku = “sku1234”)

# Get all inventory items with stock

qs = ProductInventory.objects.filter(product__web_id=”1234”).prefetch_related(‘product_inventory_id’)

qs_json = serializers.serialize(‘json’, qs)
